alert.note: Alert for Covington; Jasper; Jefferson Davis; Jones; Lawrence; Newton (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 11:40PM CDT until June 26 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jasper County in east central Mississippi... Southern Newton County in east central Mississippi... Lawrence County in south central Mississippi... Covington County in southeastern Mississippi... Jones County in southeastern Mississippi... Jefferson Davis County in south central Mississippi... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1140 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lake to near Raleigh to near Sanatorium to near Shivers, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Roberts and Lawrence around 1150 PM CDT. Mount Olive and Montrose around 1155 PM CDT. Lone Star and Stringer around 1200 AM CDT. Collins, Soso and Hebron around 1205 AM CDT. Seminary, Rose Hill, Moss and Paulding around 1210 AM CDT. Laurel and Ellisville around 1215 AM CDT. Tuckers Crossing around 1220 AM CDT. Moselle, Sanford and Mill Creek around 1225 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Lightsey. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Covington; Jasper; Jefferson Davis; Jones; Lawrence; Newton
